predicate.note: Frames file for 'expel' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

roleset.name: to force or drive out, to discharge from

example.name: passive with Arg2
example.text: Two firms were expelled [*-150] from the NASD , three were suspended or barred [*-1] and nine were fined [*-151] .

example.name: passive with ArgM-CAU
example.text: First Securities Group of California and a principal of the firm , Louis Fernando Vargas of Marina del Rey , Calif. , were jointly fined [*-1] $ 15,000 [*U*] and expelled [*-1] for alleged violations of reporting requirements on securities sales .
